title: Night Curfew
overview: During a deadly pandemic, Dr. Durga and her exhausted team at a private hospital face chaos when a new patient, Tina, mysteriously dies. Her menacing husband, Raghuram, demands the death be certified as COVID-19, but Dr. Durga discovers signs of murder. With Raghuram taking control of the hospital, Dr. Durga must protect her patients and solve the mystery of Tina's death in this suspenseful, high-stakes thriller based on true events.
